item.description:
Patriot's vs Bills

Let's go watch and cheer on the Patriot's for the last of their regular game of 2011/2012 season.  So Come on out with friends to a great restaurant and bar watch a great game with an awesome football team.

 

The Winner's Circle has great food and an awesome selection of beer check out their site here http://www.winnerscirclema.com/home.html&nb...; Please note they do NOT take credit cards, but they do have an ATM if you need to use it. 

 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.  Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change. 

Please remember that if you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event.  If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer”

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna & Jane
item.how_to_find_us: Come inside walk into the seating area to the right, we will be sitting there.
item.name: Let's go watch the Patriot's game!
